content: But what we expect and what we hope is we can continue to diversify the base and broaden the base of retailers and new consumers, to Brad's point about our customer base going up, such that when things do turn or when less -- when we see the tightened credit supply above us, which is still our base case assumption, the top of the funnel opens up even wider, and we have a bigger pool of applicants to approve and to convert and to grow GMV with.
